sourcesContent:
import dateNormalization from "../utils/functions" const ModalCard = ({data, handleIdSearch}) => { console.log(data) return(

{data.media_type ? `${data.name} (${data.original_name})`: `${data.title} (${data.original_title})` }

{data.tagline}

Estreno: {data.first_air_date ? dateNormalization(data.first_air_date) : dateNormalization(data.release_date)}

Votos de la gente: {data.vote_average}%

{data.overview}

) } export default ModalCard
